Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI tend to tell you exactly where and how you can improve… teachers are more cryptic and you have to try to figure out what they mean by their feedback.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response:
GenAI feedback felt constructive and supportive ALL of the time. 
Teacher feedback often feel negative but can sometimes be supportive and constructive…
